name: Create new players in Pointagram from new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a source Google Sheets spreadsheet and uses the retrieved information to create new players in Pointagram. 

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zl2IG094Ql9mDZX2kMTtYwcdJUA25Q0MPWYhJeHAFaY/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
